<js>
try{
	$=JSON.parse(src).text
	if($=="no file")$=[];
	}
catch(err){

	mat = baseUrl.match(/^(.*?com)[^##]*\/(.+)$/)
		url = java.put('url', mat[1])
		uri = java.put('uri', mat[2])

function $(reg){
		return uri.match(reg)?true:false
	}

//get【pwd】(链接提取码)
pwd = 
$(/##[^【]/)?  baseUrl.match(/##(.*?)(【|$)/)[1]:
"";

eval(result.match(/var pgs;([\s\S]*?pgs.+;)/)[1]);
eval('$='+result.match(/data :([\s\S]*?\})/)[1])

body = "";
for(key in $)body += key+'='+$[key]+'&';
body = String(body).replace(/&$/,'');

url += `/filemoreajax.php,{"method":"POST","body":"${body}"}`

java.ajax(url)}
</js>
$.text

	mat = baseUrl.match(/^(.*?com)[^##]*\/(.+)$/)
		url = java.put('url', mat[1])
		uri = java.put('uri', mat[2])

function $(reg){
		return uri.match(reg)?true:false
	}

//get【pwd】(链接提取码)

body = "";
for(key in $)body += key+'='+$[key]+'&';

url += `/filemoreajax.php,{"method":"POST","body":"${body}"}`

java.ajax(url)
</js>

<js>
json=[];
if(baseUrl.match(/ /)){
list=baseUrl.replace(/http.*?wd=\s*/,'').split(' ');
for(i in list){
href=list[i].match(/【(.*?)】/)[1];
text=list[i].match(/《(.*?)》/)[1];
intro=list[i].match(/◎(.*?)◎/)[1];
index=list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)?list[i].match(/^(\d+、\d+、)/)[1]:list[i].match(/^(.*?)【/)[1]
json.push({text:text,src:href,intro:intro,index:index})
}
}

'+(Number(j)+1)+'楼 '+l[j].body+'
'+getBooklist(l[j].recommend_novelinfo)+"

"; } reply = "

'+getBooklist(list)+reply+'
'; result = String(html) .replace(/
\s*<\/div>|\s* 级 \s*<\/span>|全部讨论（0）回复/g,''); result = /subjectDetail/.test(baseUrl)?result.replace(/荐书描述 共\d+本/,'找书描述'):result }catch(e){ }

J.select('video source') : java.getElements('video source'); if (!list1[0]) { res = String(java.getElements('script[type="application/ld+json"]')); url1 = res.match(/contentUrl":\s*"(.*?)"/)[1]; Value.push({src:url1,size:'0'}); } else { for (j in list1) { Value.push({src:list1[j].attr('src'),size:list1[j].attr('size')}); } } Value.sort((a, b) => parseInt(b.size) - parseInt(a.size)); value = JSON.stringify(Value); } return ``; }).join('\n'); style = /裏番|泡麵番/.test(type) ? '' : ' style="display:none;"'; jishu = `
\n

	url=baseUrl + source.getVariable() + "-------------.html";
	
	data=java.ajax(url);
	
	//java.log(data)
	
	java.setContent(data);
	
	html=java.getElement(a);
	
	if(data.match("请不要频繁操作")){
		
		java.longToast("搜索时间间隔5秒")
		
		}
		else if(data.match("输入验证码"))
		{
			yzm=java.getVerificationCode("https://www.freeok.vip/index.php/verify/index.html?")
			
	java.log(yzm)
	
	var yzmurl="https://www.freeok.vip/index.php/ajax/verify_check?type=search&verify="+yzm+","+JSON.stringify({"method": "POST","referer":url});
	
	cookie=java.getCookie(yzmurl);
	
	java.log(java.ajax(yzmurl))
	
	url=url+","+JSON.stringify({"cookie":cookie})
	
	java.log(url)
	
	data=java.ajax(url)
	
	//java.log(data)
	
	java.setContent(data);
	
	html=java.getElement(a);
}
  
	}else{html=html}
	html
</js>

<js>
var element='class.module-item';

var source=source.getVariable();

if (baseUrl.match(/search/)){
	java.log(String(source).length)
	
	String(source).length==0?java.longToast("没有搜索关键词，请在右上角源变量中输入"):java.longToast(source+"：搜索完成")
	
	search_url=baseUrl+"?wd="+source;
	
	data=java.ajax(search_url);
	
	java.setContent(data);
	
	result=java.getElement(element)
	
	}else{
		
		result=java.getElement(element)
		
		}
	result
</js>

injectJs: if(location.href.indexOf('https://passport.csdn.net/signwap')!=-1 || location.href.indexOf('https://passport.gitcode.net/cross')!=-1){localStorage.removeItem('isLogin')};function getCookie(name){var cookies = document.cookie.split(';');for (var i = 0; i < cookies.length; i++) {var cookie = cookies[i].trim();if (cookie.indexOf(name + '=') === 0) {return cookie.substring(name.length + 1);}} return null;}if(getCookie('UserName') && localStorage.getItem('isLogin')!=1){localStorage.setItem('isLogin',1);location.href=`https://blog.csdn.net/${getCookie('UserName')}`};setTimeout(()=>{ if(getCookie('UserName')){if(document.querySelector('.logout')){var para = document.createElement('a');para.setAttribute('href','https://passport.csdn.net/account/logout');para.setAttribute('class','openApp');para.innerHTML='退出';document.querySelector('.openApp').parentNode.replaceChild(para,document.querySelector('.openApp'));}else{var para = document.createElement('a');para.setAttribute('href',`https://blog.csdn.net/${getCookie('UserName')}`);para.setAttribute('class','openApp');para.innerHTML='个人中心';document.querySelector('.openApp').parentNode.replaceChild(para,document.querySelector('.openApp'));}}else{ document.querySelector('.openApp').parentNode.removeChild(document.querySelector('.openApp'));} },300);setTimeout(()=>{document.querySelector('.m_toolbar_left_app_btn').parentNode.removeChild(document.querySelector('.m_toolbar_left_app_btn'));},300);
style: .openApp,.m_toolbar_left_app_btn{display:none !important;}
